name: MobilusCosmo

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Enjoy the mobility" is the expression of our commitment
in work on solutions that increase the comfort of everyday life. The goal of MOBILUS MOTOR is to provide new solutions enabling the selection of controls without having to use the usual schemes.

Now you can easly voice control group of devices sucha as light, dimmers, blinds, garage door etc.

To handle the Mobilus Motor by the Alexa skill you must have:
- Device MOBILUS COSMO | GTW - central unit
- Serial number of central unit to pair alexa account with mobilus motor account.
- Account in Mobilus Motor serivice to pair alexa account with mobilus motor account
- installed alexa application or alexa device for voice control devices
